response.original_title: Exchange of Mail at Rural P.O., U.S.P.O.
response.overview: Another in a series of films made for the USPO in 1903, this short shows a small coach pulling up outside a rural post office. A man climbs out of the back of the carriage and unlocks the post box outside a ramshackle looking building under the watchful gaze of a small child.
response.title: Exchange of Mail at Rural P.O., U.S.P.O.
